      • cloneErrataFaster

        public static java.lang.Long cloneErrataFaster(java.lang.Long eid,
                                               Org org)
        Hibernate was way too slow if cloning lots of errata. This does all the hard stuff directly in the db using mode queries.
        Parameters:
        eid - Id of the original erratum to clone
        org - Org to clone into
        Returns:
        Id of the cloned erratum

      • cloneErrataFast

        @Deprecated
public static Errata cloneErrataFast(Errata original,
                                                 Org org)
        Deprecated. this function is deprecated by cloneErrataFaster
        Clones an errata Similarly to ErrataFactory.createClone, but creates a published errata instead of going through the stupid process of being unpublished and then copying all the data to 4 tables
        Parameters:
        original - the original errata to clone
        org - the org to clone it for
        Returns:
        The cloned (and published) errata

        Generates a unique errata clone advisory and advisoryName and sets them to the errata clone
        Parameters:
        original - original erratum
        clone - cloned erratum
